entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , St. Catharines
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 9:55 PM EST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 1.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: St. Catharines / Niagara District Airport 01:00 AM EST Sunday 05 February 2023
Temperature: 1.8°C
Pressure: 101.6 kPa
Humidity: 55 %
Dewpoint: -6.3°C
Wind: SSW 27 km/h gust 37 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Saturday night: Partly cloudy. Temperature rising to plus 3 by morning.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature rising to plus 3 by morning. Wind chill minus 13 this evening. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Temperature steady near plus 3. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy near noon with 40 percent chance of rain showers or flurries or drizzle late in the afternoon. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 increasing to 40 gusting to 70 in the morning. Temperature steady near plus 3. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low minus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of rain showers or flurries or drizzle early in the evening then 40 percent chance of flurries late in the evening. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming northwest 20 after midnight. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Saturday 04 February 2023
